summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Carleton Avenue, from East Marginal Way to Bailey Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading, and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9522 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
